title: ENG-439156 validate Pending change modal when Edit DLP profiles in existing RT policy with No terminal action defined, apply pending change and save should work
custom_summary: Edit DLP profiles in existing RT policy with No terminal action defined, expected "match_criteria_action" field to be null and handle correctly to Save policy. However, in R114 issue was introduced and pending change pop -up was keep loading as "match_criteria_action" : null was not handled correctly on Policy Edit Flow.
custom_steps:
1. Create RT policy with Dlp profile and [DO NOT configure Terminal action], save policy.
2. Edit above policy, remove DLP profile and select same/other Dlp profiles and [DO NOT configure Terminal action], try to save policy
3. There should be no issue with Pending change loading ; DLP profile change view shows as expected changes and Apply change should work as expected.
custom_expected: There should be no issue with Pending change loading ; DLP profile change view shows as expected changes and Apply change should work as expected.
